name: Lisbon Arbitration Centre for Consumer Complaints
goal:
Alternative dispute resolution for consumer complaints, through legal information, mediation and arbitration.
Member of FIN-NET for the resolution of financial cross border complaints.
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Transport
euInitiatives: Among others, Directive 2013/11/UE on Alternative Dispute Resolution procedures and all legislation pertaining consumer policies.
